'''Boot Weasel''' is a type of beast which can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor creatures, as the name implies, can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=309 Official Interactive Map] for specific locations.

==Drops==
{{Card|Raw Meat|1}}

Killing or capturing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].
